description: Stunning Graphics Bold Looks, Great Texture It's the iPod case that really makes a statement. The bold laser-etched graphics will impress and the innovative, flexible material will feel good in your hand. Protection that Fits: The thin, yet durable material is a stylish way to keep your phone's surface free of scratches and scuffs, without adding extra bulk.
title: Belkin Essential 051 Case for Apple iPod Touch 4th Generation (Fountain Blue)
